name: Death Embrace
description:
Fight hordes of zombies and other monsters in the free game Death Embrace: Zombie Shooter.

A catastrophe happened in the world and turned the majority of the world's population into zombies. You are a member of an elite special forces unit whose goal is to clear the sector from zombies. Use all your weapons, skills and tactics to survive.

In the game, you will meet many different enemies, zombies, mutants, monsters and other creatures that seek to kill you. You are armed with about a dozen different weapons and many ways to prevent enemies from killing you.

What awaits you in the game:

- many types of different weapons;
- more than 20 types of opponents;
- a huge level for survival;
- various perks for a variety of gameplay;
- pumping character;
- customization;
- lots of fun and tension!

Can you defeat all enemies and survive in this cruel world?

Compete against your friends with the Google Play Services leaderboards and get achievements for perfect play.

The game is completely free and available for download from Google Play. The game is available to play offline. The game is completely free as well as all the content in it
